function RPGStarterImport::onCreate(%this)
{
    // Add audiodata here    
    Exec("./scripts/client/audioData");

    // Add keybinds here 
}

function RPGStarterImport::onDestroy(%this)
{
}

//This is called when the server is initially set up by the game application
function RPGStarterImport::initServer(%this)
{
}

//This is called when the server is created for an actual game/map to be played
function RPGStarterImport::onCreateGameServer(%this)
{
    //These are common managed data files. For any datablock-based stuff that gets generated by the editors
    //(that doesn't have a specific associated file, like data for a player class) will go into these.
    //So we'll register them now if they exist.
    
    //managedDatablocks
    if(isFile("./datablocks/managedDatablocks." @ $TorqueScriptFileExtension))
        %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/managedDatablocks");

    //managedDecalData
    if(isFile("./datablocks/managedDecalData." @ $TorqueScriptFileExtension))
        %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/managedDecalData");

    //managedItemData
    if(isFile("./datablocks/managedItemData." @ $TorqueScriptFileExtension))
        %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/managedItemData");

    //managedForestItemData
    if(isFile("./datablocks/managedForestItemData." @ $TorqueScriptFileExtension))
        %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/managedForestItemData");

    //managedParticleEmitterData
    if(isFile("./datablocks/managedParticleEmitterData." @ $TorqueScriptFileExtension))
        %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/managedParticleEmitterData");

    //managedParticleData
    if(isFile("./datablocks/managedParticleData." @ $TorqueScriptFileExtension))
        %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/managedParticleData");


    exec( "./server/defaults.cs" );
    // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\defaults.cs (2 hits)
    //exec( "core/scripts/server/defaults.cs" );
	//exec( "./prefs.cs" );

    exec("./server/init.cs");
    // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\init.cs (4 hits)
    //exec("./scripts/server/commands.cs");
    
    //exec("./scripts/server/game.cs"); // in createserver
        // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\game.cs (2 hits)

        //exec("./scriptExec.cs");
        // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\scriptExec.cs (22 hits)
            /*
            exec("./camera.cs");
            exec("./triggers.cs");
            exec("./inventory.cs");
            exec("./shapeBase.cs");
            exec("./item.cs");
            exec("./health.cs");
            exec("./projectile.cs");
            exec("./radiusDamage.cs");
            exec("./teleporter.cs");
            exec('./BadBehavior/main.cs');
            exec("./weapon.cs");
            exec("./crossbow.cs"); 
            exec("./proximityMine.cs");
            exec("./player.cs");
            exec("./gameCore.cs"); // This is the 'core' of the gametype functionality.
            exec("./gameDM.cs"); // Overrides GameCore with DeathMatch functionality.
            exec("./afx/gameAFXDemo.cs");
            */
    
        //exec("./scripts/server/afx/afxInit.cs");
        // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\afx\afxInit.cs (16 hits)
            /*
            exec("./afxCommands.cs");
            exec("./afxAutoloading.cs");
            exec("./afxSpellCasting.cs");
            exec("./afxMagicSpellCallouts.cs");
            exec("./afxScreenMessages.cs");
            exec("./afxSelectronStyles.cs");
            exec("./afxDemo.cs");
            exec("./afxDemoCommands.cs");
            exec("./afxSpellbookCasting.cs");
            exec("./afxNonPlayer.cs");
            exec("./afxNonPlayerWrangler.cs");
            exec("./afxEffects.cs"); 
            exec("./afxCamera.cs");
            exec("./afxPlayer.cs");
            exec("./afxDemoSpellbook.cs"); 
            */
    //exec("./scripts/server/afx/afxDatablockCache.cs");

    // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\afx\afxAutoloading.cs (2 hits)
        exec($afxAutoloadScriptFile);
        exec($afxAutoloadScriptFile);


    // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\afx\afxEffects.cs (2 hits)
        exec("./afxSharedFX.cs");
        exec("./afxPlaceholders.cs");


    // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\server\afx\afxFixedLoading.cs (1 hit)
        exec($afxAutoloadScriptFile);




    // e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\datablocks\datablockExec.cs
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/audioProfiles.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/lights.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/particles.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/environment.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/triggers.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/rigidShape.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/health.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapon.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapons/grenadefx.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapons/rocketfx.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapons/Lurker.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapons/Ryder.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapons/ProxMine.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapons/Turret.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/weapons/crossbow.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/player.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/aiPlayer.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/actors/OrcWarrior.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/actors/OrcMage.cs");
    %this.registerDatablock("./datablocks/actors/SpaceOrcMage.cs");


 

}

//This is called when the server is shut down due to the game/map being exited
function RPGStarterImport::onDestroyGameServer(%this)
{
}

//This is called when the client is initially set up by the game application
function RPGStarterImport::initClient(%this)
{

// e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\client\defaults
%this.queueExec("core/scripts/client/defaults.cs");         // noexist
%this.queueExec("./prefs.cs" );

// e:\RPG_Starter3\My Projects\RPGStarterImport\scripts\client\init
%this.queueExec("art/gui/defaultGameProfiles");             // noexist
%this.queueExec("art/gui/customProfiles");                  // noexist

%this.queueExec("./scripts/gui/afx/playGui_AFX"); // +
%this.queueExec("./scripts/gui/startupGui");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/gui/chooseLevelDlg");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/gui/loadingGui");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/gui/optionsDlg");

%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/client");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/game");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/missionDownload");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/serverConnection");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/afx/afxScreenMessages");   
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/afx/afxCastingBar");   
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/afx/afxSelectionMgr");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/afx/afxClientUtil");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/shaders");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/afx/default.bind_AFX");
%this.queueExec("./scripts/client/config");

%this.queueExec("./guis/playGui_AFX.gui");
%this.queueExec("./guis/editFXFilteringGui.gui");
/*
%this.queueExec("art/gui/mainMenuGui.gui");
%this.queueExec("art/gui/joinServerDlg.gui");
%this.queueExec("art/gui/endGameGui.gui");
%this.queueExec("art/gui/StartupGui.gui");
%this.queueExec("art/gui/chooseLevelDlg.gui");
%this.queueExec("art/gui/loadingGui.gui");
%this.queueExec("art/gui/optionsDlg.gui");
%this.queueExec("art/gui/remapDlg.gui");
*/
}

//This is called when a client connects to a server
function RPGStarterImport::onCreateClientConnection(%this)
{
}

//This is called when a client disconnects from a server
function RPGStarterImport::onDestroyClientConnection(%this)
{
}
